name: Curriculum Vitae
tagline: Aspires to work as: business analyst / software tester
body:
# **Katarzyna Wolszon**
## **_Gdynia, Poland_**


### Contact
e-mail: wolszonkat@gmail.com

### Qualifications
* _Functional knowledge of:_ `C++`, `Java`, `PHP`, `HTML`, `CSS`, `Pascal`, `C#`, `UML`;
* _Familiar with:_ `JavaScript`, `node.js`, `Scala`, `Prolog`, `Groovy`, `Shell scripts`, `BPMN 2.0`;
* _Database administration:_ `PostgreSQL`, `MySQL`, `Oracle 10g/11g`;
* _Java application server administration:_ `JBoss`;
* _Used frameworks/technologies:_ `Selenium`, `jQuery`, `OpenGL`, `GWT`, `Vaadin`, `Ant`, `Maven`, `Log4j`, `JDBC`;
* _Used tools and OS:_ `Enterprise Architect 9`, `Eclipse`, `Visual Studio`, `SoapUI`, `Git`, `Notepad++`, `Vim`, `jEdit`, `SublimeText`, `MS Project`, `Windows XP/7/8/Server2008`, `Linux Ubuntu/OpenSuse`.

### Education
Polish-Japanese Institute of Information Technology _in Gdańsk_
* Bachelor's degree, Computer Science (October 2010 → February 2014)
WSB Schools of Banking _in Gdańsk_
* Postgraduate Studies, Software Tester (October 2014 → June 2015)

### Certifications and training
* ECDL (June 2010)
* CCNA Network Fundamentals ver 4.0 (June 2013)
* Adobe Photoshop C6 - Basics (June 2013)
* CCNA Routing and Switching ver. 5.0 (February 2014)
* Kainos Women’s Workshop: Introduction to Software Testing (April 2014)
* Introduction to Joomla! - Joomla! User Group Trójmiasto (May 2014)
* Workshop: Java Project; using Selenium and TestNG (November 2014 - February 2015)
* Workshop: .Net Project; using Selenium and NUnit (December 2014 - January 2015)
* Workshop: Selenium PageObject (January 2015)

### Competence in languages
* Polish    | _native_
* English   | _advanced_
* Japanese  | _beginner_
* German    | _beginner_
* Portuguese| _beginner_

### Additional information
* driving license - B category,
* certificate of competency of inland skipper.

### Interests
* Asian movies,
* Eastern culture,
* juggling
